OpenClinica:FormDetails.OpenClinica:VersionDescription: Final Draft, with March 2012 customer revisions
OpenClinica:FormDetails.OpenClinica:RevisionNotes: Ccollins - Added letter preface for mult choice options, GED to HS question text, short form literacy questions, some updates to width_decimal

OpenClinica:FormDetails.OpenClinica:VersionDescription: Final Draft, with March 2012 customer revisions
OpenClinica:FormDetails.OpenClinica:RevisionNotes: Ccollins - Revised format for report, added status column, changed recommendations from rule insert to right item text, jquery to hide text until selected

OpenClinica:FormDetails.OpenClinica:VersionDescription: Final Draft, with March 2012 customer revisions
OpenClinica:FormDetails.OpenClinica:RevisionNotes: Ccollins - Revised format for report, added status column, changed recommendations from rule insert to right item text

Question.TranslatedText:
Literacy - Now, I’d like to check your ability to read and understand the things doctors often give patients, like medical instructions. I want you to fill in the missing words. Just below the blank line, we've listed 4 possible words to complete the sentence. Choose the word that makes the most sense.
Your doctor has sent you to have a __________ X-ray.

OpenClinica:ItemPresentInForm.OpenClinica:LeftItemText:
Now, I’d like to check your ability to read and understand the things doctors often give patients, like medical instructions. I want you to fill in the missing words. Just below the blank line, we've listed 4 possible words to complete the sentence. Choose the word that makes the most sense.
Your doctor has sent you to have a __________ X-ray.

Question.TranslatedText: You must have an _________ stomach when you come for _______.

OpenClinica:ItemPresentInForm.OpenClinica:LeftItemText: You must have an _________ stomach when you come for _______.

Question.TranslatedText: The X-ray will ________ from 1 to 3 _________ to do.

OpenClinica:ItemPresentInForm.OpenClinica:LeftItemText: The X-ray will ________ from 1 to 3 _________ to do.

Question.TranslatedText: How old are you?

OpenClinica:ItemPresentInForm.OpenClinica:LeftItemText: How old are you?
OpenClinica:ItemPresentInForm.OpenClinica:ItemSubHeader: We’d like to start by asking you some general questions about yourself:

Question.TranslatedText: What is your gender?

OpenClinica:ItemPresentInForm.OpenClinica:LeftItemText: What is your gender?

Question.TranslatedText: What is your race?

OpenClinica:ItemPresentInForm.OpenClinica:LeftItemText: What is your race?

Question.TranslatedText: What is your ethnicity?

OpenClinica:ItemPresentInForm.OpenClinica:LeftItemText: What is your ethnicity?

ItemDef.Name: PARTNER
ItemDef.Comment: Are you married or living with a partner?

Question.TranslatedText: Are you married or living with a partner?

OpenClinica:ItemPresentInForm.OpenClinica:LeftItemText: Are you married or living with a partner?

Question.TranslatedText: If no, are you:

OpenClinica:ItemPresentInForm.OpenClinica:LeftItemText: If no, are you:

Question.TranslatedText: How tall are you?

OpenClinica:ItemPresentInForm.OpenClinica:LeftItemText: How tall are you?

Question.TranslatedText: How much do you weigh?

OpenClinica:ItemPresentInForm.OpenClinica:LeftItemText: How much do you weigh?

Question.TranslatedText: Did you graduate from high school or the equivalent (such as obtain your G.E.D.)?

OpenClinica:ItemPresentInForm.OpenClinica:LeftItemText: Did you graduate from high school or the equivalent (such as obtain your G.E.D.)?

ItemDef.Name: RATE_HEALTH
ItemDef.Comment: Overall, how would you rate your health?

Question.TranslatedText: Overall, how would you rate your health?

OpenClinica:ItemPresentInForm.OpenClinica:LeftItemText: Overall, how would you rate your health?
OpenClinica:ItemPresentInForm.OpenClinica:ItemSubHeader: Now, we’d like to ask you some questions about your health:

Question.TranslatedText: Do you smoke?

OpenClinica:ItemPresentInForm.OpenClinica:LeftItemText: Do you smoke?

ItemDef.Name: DRINKS
ItemDef.Comment: On average, how many days per week do you drink alcohol such as beer, wine, or liquor?

Question.TranslatedText: On average, how many days per week do you drink alcohol such as beer, wine, or liquor?

OpenClinica:ItemPresentInForm.OpenClinica:LeftItemText: On average, how many days per week do you drink alcohol such as beer, wine, or liquor?

ItemDef.Name: DENTIST
ItemDef.Comment: Has it been longer than one year since you have seen a dentist?

Question.TranslatedText: Has it been longer than one year since you have seen a dentist?

OpenClinica:ItemPresentInForm.OpenClinica:LeftItemText: Has it been longer than one year since you have seen a dentist?

ItemDef.Name: PAIN_MOUTH
ItemDef.Comment: Do you have any pain in your mouth?

Question.TranslatedText: Do you have any pain in your mouth?

OpenClinica:ItemPresentInForm.OpenClinica:LeftItemText: Do you have any pain in your mouth?

ItemDef.Name: GUM_BLEED
ItemDef.Comment: Do your gums bleed when you brush your teeth?

Question.TranslatedText: Do your gums bleed when you brush your teeth?

OpenClinica:ItemPresentInForm.OpenClinica:LeftItemText: Do your gums bleed when you brush your teeth?

ItemDef.Name: SAD
ItemDef.Comment: In the last two weeks, have you had little interest or pleasure in doing things?

Question.TranslatedText: In the last two weeks, have you had little interest or pleasure in doing things?

OpenClinica:ItemPresentInForm.OpenClinica:LeftItemText: In the last two weeks, have you had little interest or pleasure in doing things?

ItemDef.Name: INTEREST
ItemDef.Comment: In the last two weeks, have you been feeling down, depressed, or hopeless?

Question.TranslatedText: In the last two weeks, have you been feeling down, depressed, or hopeless?

OpenClinica:ItemPresentInForm.OpenClinica:LeftItemText: In the last two weeks, have you been feeling down, depressed, or hopeless?

Question.TranslatedText: How many sexual partners have you had in the last year?

OpenClinica:ItemPresentInForm.OpenClinica:LeftItemText: How many sexual partners have you had in the last year?

ItemDef.Name: TYPICAL_DRINK
ItemDef.Comment: On a typical day when you drink, how many drinks do you have? A drink is defined as one 12 oz bottle of beer or wine cooler, a 5 oz glass of wine, or 1.5 ounces of distilled spirits.

Question.TranslatedText: On a typical day when you drink, how many drinks do you have? A drink is defined as one 12 oz bottle of beer or wine cooler, a 5 oz glass of wine, or 1.5 ounces of distilled spirits.

OpenClinica:ItemPresentInForm.OpenClinica:LeftItemText: On a typical day when you drink, how many drinks do you have? A drink is defined as one 12 oz bottle of beer or wine cooler, a 5 oz glass of wine, or 1.5 ounces of distilled spirits.

ItemDef.Name: MAXIMUM_DRINKS
ItemDef.Comment: What is the maximum number of drinks you had on any given day in the past month?

Question.TranslatedText: What is the maximum number of drinks you had on any given day in the past month?

OpenClinica:ItemPresentInForm.OpenClinica:LeftItemText: What is the maximum number of drinks you had on any given day in the past month?

Question.TranslatedText: Have you had a colonoscopy in the last ten years?

OpenClinica:ItemPresentInForm.OpenClinica:LeftItemText: Have you had a colonoscopy in the last ten years?

ItemDef.Name: WALK_TEST
ItemDef.Comment: Have you fallen in the last year?

Question.TranslatedText: Have you fallen in the last year?

OpenClinica:ItemPresentInForm.OpenClinica:LeftItemText: Have you fallen in the last year?

ItemDef.Name: LEG_BALANCE
ItemDef.Comment: Can you stand on one leg for longer than five seconds without support?

Question.TranslatedText: Can you stand on one leg for longer than five seconds without support?

OpenClinica:ItemPresentInForm.OpenClinica:LeftItemText: Can you stand on one leg for longer than five seconds without support?

Question.TranslatedText: How often do you use condoms with your sexual partner(s) when NOT trying to get pregnant?

OpenClinica:ItemPresentInForm.OpenClinica:LeftItemText: How often do you use condoms with your sexual partner(s) when NOT trying to get pregnant?

ItemDef.Name: PART_HURT
ItemDef.Comment: How often does your partner physically hurt you?

Question.TranslatedText: How often does your partner physically hurt you?

OpenClinica:ItemPresentInForm.OpenClinica:LeftItemText: How often does your partner physically hurt you?

ItemDef.Name: PART_INSULT
ItemDef.Comment: How often does your partner insult or talk down to you?

Question.TranslatedText: How often does your partner insult or talk down to you?

OpenClinica:ItemPresentInForm.OpenClinica:LeftItemText: How often does your partner insult or talk down to you?

ItemDef.Name: PART_THREAT
ItemDef.Comment: How often does your partner threaten you with harm?

Question.TranslatedText: How often does your partner threaten you with harm?

OpenClinica:ItemPresentInForm.OpenClinica:LeftItemText: How often does your partner threaten you with harm?

ItemDef.Name: PART_SCREM
ItemDef.Comment: How often does your partner scream or curse at you?

Question.TranslatedText: How often does your partner scream or curse at you?

OpenClinica:ItemPresentInForm.OpenClinica:LeftItemText: How often does your partner scream or curse at you?

ItemDef.Name: PLEASURE
ItemDef.Comment: Little interest or pleasure in doing things

Question.TranslatedText: Little interest or pleasure in doing things

OpenClinica:ItemPresentInForm.OpenClinica:LeftItemText: Little interest or pleasure in doing things
OpenClinica:ItemPresentInForm.OpenClinica:ItemSubHeader: Over the last two weeks, how often have you been bothered by any of the following problems?

Question.TranslatedText: Feeling down, depressed, or hopeless

OpenClinica:ItemPresentInForm.OpenClinica:LeftItemText: Feeling down, depressed, or hopeless

ItemDef.Name: SLEEP
ItemDef.Comment: Trouble falling or staying asleep, or sleeping too much

Question.TranslatedText: Trouble falling or staying asleep, or sleeping too much

OpenClinica:ItemPresentInForm.OpenClinica:LeftItemText: Trouble falling or staying asleep, or sleeping too much

ItemDef.Name: LOW_ENRGY
ItemDef.Comment: Feeling tired or having little energy

Question.TranslatedText: Feeling tired or having little energy

OpenClinica:ItemPresentInForm.OpenClinica:LeftItemText: Feeling tired or having little energy

Question.TranslatedText: Poor appetitie or overeating

OpenClinica:ItemPresentInForm.OpenClinica:LeftItemText: Poor appetitie or overeating

ItemDef.Name: FEEL_BAD
ItemDef.Comment: Feeling bad about yourself- or that you are a failure or have let yourself or your family down

Question.TranslatedText: Feeling bad about yourself- or that you are a failure or have let yourself or your family down

OpenClinica:ItemPresentInForm.OpenClinica:LeftItemText: Feeling bad about yourself- or that you are a failure or have let yourself or your family down

ItemDef.Name: CONCENTRATION
ItemDef.Comment: Trouble concentrating on things, such as reading the newspaper or watching television

Question.TranslatedText: Trouble concentrating on things, such as reading the newspaper or watching television

OpenClinica:ItemPresentInForm.OpenClinica:LeftItemText: Trouble concentrating on things, such as reading the newspaper or watching television

ItemDef.Name: SLOW
ItemDef.Comment: Moving or speaking so slowly that other people could have noticed? Or the opposite- being so fidgety or restless that you have been moving around a lot more than usual

Question.TranslatedText: Moving or speaking so slowly that other people could have noticed? Or the opposite- being so fidgety or restless that you have been moving around a lot more than usual

OpenClinica:ItemPresentInForm.OpenClinica:LeftItemText: Moving or speaking so slowly that other people could have noticed? Or the opposite- being so fidgety or restless that you have been moving around a lot more than usual

ItemDef.Name: SUICIDE
ItemDef.Comment: Thoughts that you would be better off dead or of hurting yourself in some way

Question.TranslatedText: Thoughts that you would be better off dead or of hurting yourself in some way

OpenClinica:ItemPresentInForm.OpenClinica:LeftItemText: Thoughts that you would be better off dead or of hurting yourself in some way

ItemDef.Name: PHQ_FINAL
ItemDef.Comment: If you checked off any problems, how difficult have these problems made it for you to do work, take care of things at home, or get along with other people?

Question.TranslatedText: If you checked off any problems, how difficult have these problems made it for you to do work, take care of things at home, or get along with other people?

OpenClinica:ItemPresentInForm.OpenClinica:LeftItemText: If you checked off any problems, how difficult have these problems made it for you to do work, take care of things at home, or get along with other people?

Question.TranslatedText: I have nightmares or flashbacks

OpenClinica:ItemPresentInForm.OpenClinica:LeftItemText: I have nightmares or flashbacks

ItemDef.Name: JUMPY
ItemDef.Comment: I am jumpy or feel startled easily

Question.TranslatedText: I am jumpy or feel startled easily

OpenClinica:ItemPresentInForm.OpenClinica:LeftItemText: I am jumpy or feel startled easily

ItemDef.Name: EXPERIENCE
ItemDef.Comment: I avoid places that strongly remind me of a bad experience

Question.TranslatedText: I avoid places that strongly remind me of a bad experience

OpenClinica:ItemPresentInForm.OpenClinica:LeftItemText: I avoid places that strongly remind me of a bad experience

ItemDef.Name: DULL
ItemDef.Comment: I feel dull, numb or detached

Question.TranslatedText: I feel dull, numb or detached

OpenClinica:ItemPresentInForm.OpenClinica:LeftItemText: I feel dull, numb or detached

ItemDef.Name: ENOUGH_FOOD
ItemDef.Comment: Do you and your family have enough healthy food to eat?

Question.TranslatedText: Do you and your family have enough healthy food to eat?

OpenClinica:ItemPresentInForm.OpenClinica:LeftItemText: Do you and your family have enough healthy food to eat?

ItemDef.Name: MONEY_HEAT
ItemDef.Comment: Do you have enough money to heat your home this winter?

Question.TranslatedText: Do you have enough money to heat your home this winter? OR Thinking back to last winter, did you have enough money to heat your home?

OpenClinica:ItemPresentInForm.OpenClinica:LeftItemText: Do you have enough money to heat your home this winter? OR Thinking back to last winter, did you have enough money to heat your home?

ItemDef.Name: LOSE_HOUSE
ItemDef.Comment: Are you behind in paying your rent or mortgagge?

Question.TranslatedText: Are you behind in paying your rent or mortgage?

OpenClinica:ItemPresentInForm.OpenClinica:LeftItemText: Are you behind in paying your rent or mortgage?

Question.TranslatedText:
Health Category   Status                       Notes/Comments - Falls - History of falls or poor balance. Possible poly pharmacy, neuropathy, balance, gait, weakness, vision, osteoporosis, etc. should be addressed. Patient should also be referred for gait/balance training (Physical Therapy) and the use of assistive devices (cane, walker, etc.) to reduce risk of falls and injury.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

OpenClinica:ItemPresentInForm.OpenClinica:LeftItemText: Falls
OpenClinica:ItemPresentInForm.OpenClinica:RightItemText:
History of falls or poor balance. Possible poly pharmacy, neuropathy, balance, gait, weakness, vision, osteoporosis, etc. should be addressed. Patient should also be referred for gait/balance training (Physical Therapy) and the use of assistive devices (cane, walker, etc.) to reduce risk of falls and injury.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

OpenClinica:ItemPresentInForm.OpenClinica:LeftItemText: Falls

Question.TranslatedText:
Osteoporosis - Risk for osteoporosis. Bone density scan and follow-up recommended. Consider vitamin D measurement and supplementation with vitamin D and calcium in appropriate patients.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

OpenClinica:ItemPresentInForm.OpenClinica:LeftItemText: Osteoporosis
OpenClinica:ItemPresentInForm.OpenClinica:RightItemText:
Risk for osteoporosis. Bone density scan and follow-up recommended. Consider vitamin D measurement and supplementation with vitamin D and calcium in appropriate patients.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

OpenClinica:ItemPresentInForm.OpenClinica:LeftItemText: Osteoporosis

Question.TranslatedText:
Smoking - Patient is a current smoker. Assessment for CVD risk recommended. Patient should be counseled to quit and offered pharmacologic and non pharmacologic adjuncts to quitting. Referral to Pharm D for counseling should be considered.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

OpenClinica:ItemPresentInForm.OpenClinica:LeftItemText: Smoking
OpenClinica:ItemPresentInForm.OpenClinica:RightItemText:
Patient is a current smoker. Assessment for CVD risk recommended. Patient should be counseled to quit and offered pharmacologic and non pharmacologic adjuncts to quitting. Referral to Pharm D for counseling should be considered.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

OpenClinica:ItemPresentInForm.OpenClinica:LeftItemText: Smoking

Question.TranslatedText:
Alcohol - Risky alcohol use. Counseling on health risks recommended, with possible referral for follow up with social worker. Options for counseling and treatment (both outpatient and inpatient) should be delineated.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

OpenClinica:ItemPresentInForm.OpenClinica:LeftItemText: Alcohol
OpenClinica:ItemPresentInForm.OpenClinica:RightItemText:
Risky alcohol use. Counseling on health risks recommended, with possible referral for follow up with social worker. Options for counseling and treatment (both outpatient and inpatient) should be delineated.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

OpenClinica:ItemPresentInForm.OpenClinica:LeftItemText: Alcohol

Question.TranslatedText:
Risky Sexual Behavior - Multiple sexual partners over last year and inconsistent condom use. STI testing and sexual health counseling recommended. Referral to the Department of Health (first floor of Burgdorf) should be considered.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

OpenClinica:ItemPresentInForm.OpenClinica:LeftItemText: Risky Sexual Behavior
OpenClinica:ItemPresentInForm.OpenClinica:RightItemText:
Multiple sexual partners over last year and inconsistent condom use. STI testing and sexual health counseling recommended. Referral to the Department of Health (first floor of Burgdorf) should be considered.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

OpenClinica:ItemPresentInForm.OpenClinica:LeftItemText: Risky Sexual Behavior

Question.TranslatedText:
Intimate Partner Violence - Current intimate partner violence. Immediate referral to social work recommended. Shelters and other options should be offered.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

OpenClinica:ItemPresentInForm.OpenClinica:LeftItemText: Intimate Partner Violence
OpenClinica:ItemPresentInForm.OpenClinica:RightItemText:
Current intimate partner violence. Immediate referral to social work recommended. Shelters and other options should be offered.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

OpenClinica:ItemPresentInForm.OpenClinica:LeftItemText: Intimate Partner Violence

Question.TranslatedText:
Health Literacy - Limited health literacy. Ensure patient understands health recommendations and refer to social worker for literacy services. Health literacy level should be added to the patients problem list in the Electronic Medical Record.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

OpenClinica:ItemPresentInForm.OpenClinica:LeftItemText: Health Literacy
OpenClinica:ItemPresentInForm.OpenClinica:RightItemText:
Limited health literacy. Ensure patient understands health recommendations and refer to social worker for literacy services. Health literacy level should be added to the patients problem list in the Electronic Medical Record.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

OpenClinica:ItemPresentInForm.OpenClinica:LeftItemText: Health Literacy

Question.TranslatedText:
Oral Health - Oral health concerns. Referral to dental clinic recommended.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

OpenClinica:ItemPresentInForm.OpenClinica:LeftItemText: Oral Health
Oral Health

Question.TranslatedText:
Depression - Mild depression risk. Follow up recommended with PCP. Moderate depression risk. Referral to social work and follow up recommended. Severe depression risk. Immediate safety assessment, referral to social work and follow up required.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

OpenClinica:ItemPresentInForm.OpenClinica:LeftItemText: Depression
OpenClinica:ItemPresentInForm.OpenClinica:RightItemText:
Mild depression risk. Follow up recommended with PCP. Moderate depression risk. Referral to social work and follow up recommended. Severe depression risk. Immediate safety assessment, referral to social work and follow up required.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

OpenClinica:ItemPresentInForm.OpenClinica:LeftItemText: Depression

Question.TranslatedText:
Post Traumatic Stress Disorder - PTSD risk. Recommend checking depression screening results and referral to social work. If veteran, should be encouraged to access veteran services.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

OpenClinica:ItemPresentInForm.OpenClinica:LeftItemText: Post Traumatic Stress Disorder
OpenClinica:ItemPresentInForm.OpenClinica:RightItemText:
PTSD risk. Recommend checking depression screening results and referral to social work. If veteran, should be encouraged to access veteran services.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

OpenClinica:ItemPresentInForm.OpenClinica:LeftItemText: Post Traumatic Stress Disorder

Question.TranslatedText:
Colon Cancer - Colonoscopy either not current or unknown. History of colon cancer screening should be documented. Personal and family history of colon polyps and cancer, should be obtained and reviewed. Referral for colonoscopic assessment as appropriate, recommended.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

OpenClinica:ItemPresentInForm.OpenClinica:LeftItemText: Colon Cancer
OpenClinica:ItemPresentInForm.OpenClinica:RightItemText:
Colonoscopy either not current or unknown. History of colon cancer screening should be documented. Personal and family history of colon polyps and cancer, should be obtained and reviewed. Referral for colonoscopic assessment as appropriate, recommended.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

OpenClinica:ItemPresentInForm.OpenClinica:LeftItemText: Colon Cancer

Question.TranslatedText:
Basic Needs - Food or housing insecurity. Referral to social work recommended.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

OpenClinica:ItemPresentInForm.OpenClinica:LeftItemText: Basic Needs
Basic Needs

Question.TranslatedText:
BMI - Patient is overweight/obese. Brief counseling and referral to nutrition services recommended.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

OpenClinica:ItemPresentInForm.OpenClinica:LeftItemText: BMI
OpenClinica:ItemPresentInForm.OpenClinica:RightItemText:
Patient is overweight/obese. Brief counseling and referral to nutrition services recommended.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

OpenClinica:ItemPresentInForm.OpenClinica:LeftItemText: BMI

OpenClinica:StudyParameterList.Name: When Performing Data Entry, Interviewer Name Required For Data Entry
When Performing Data Entry, Interviewer Name Default as Blank
When Performing Data Entry, Interviewer Name Editable
When Performing Data Entry, Interview Date Required
When Performing Data Entry, Interview Date Default as Blank
When Performing Data Entry, Interview Date Editable

OpenClinicaRules:RuleDef.Name: MSD
OpenClinicaRules:RuleDef.OpenClinicaRules:Expression: (I_CPCS_LOW_ENRGY + I_CPCS_APPETITE + I_CPCS_SLEEP + I_CPCS_HOPELESS + I_CPCS_SUICIDE + I_CPCS_PLEASURE + I_CPCS_FEEL_BAD +I_CPCS_CONCENTRATION +I_CPCS_SLOW + I_CPCS_PHQ_FINAL) gte 150 and (I_CPCS_LOW_ENRGY + I_CPCS_APPETITE + I_CPCS_SLEEP + I_CPCS_HOPELESS + I_CPCS_SUICIDE + I_CPCS_PLEASURE + I_CPCS_FEEL_BAD +I_CPCS_CONCENTRATION +I_CPCS_SLOW + I_CPCS_PHQ_FINAL) lt 200

OpenClinicaRules:RuleDef.Name: MOD
OpenClinicaRules:RuleDef.OpenClinicaRules:Expression: (I_CPCS_LOW_ENRGY + I_CPCS_APPETITE + I_CPCS_SLEEP + I_CPCS_HOPELESS + I_CPCS_SUICIDE + I_CPCS_PLEASURE + I_CPCS_FEEL_BAD +I_CPCS_CONCENTRATION +I_CPCS_SLOW + I_CPCS_PHQ_FINAL) gte 100 and (I_CPCS_LOW_ENRGY + I_CPCS_APPETITE + I_CPCS_SLEEP + I_CPCS_HOPELESS + I_CPCS_SUICIDE + I_CPCS_PLEASURE + I_CPCS_FEEL_BAD +I_CPCS_CONCENTRATION +I_CPCS_SLOW + I_CPCS_PHQ_FINAL) lt 150

OpenClinicaRules:RuleDef.Name: BNQ
OpenClinicaRules:RuleDef.OpenClinicaRules:Expression: I_CPCS_ENOUGH_FOOD eq 20 or I_CPCS_LOSE_HOUSE eq 20 or I_CPCS_MONEY_HEAT eq 10

OpenClinicaRules:RuleDef.Name: MD
OpenClinicaRules:RuleDef.OpenClinicaRules:Expression: (I_CPCS_LOW_ENRGY + I_CPCS_APPETITE + I_CPCS_SLEEP + I_CPCS_HOPELESS + I_CPCS_SUICIDE + I_CPCS_PLEASURE + I_CPCS_FEEL_BAD +I_CPCS_CONCENTRATION +I_CPCS_SLOW + I_CPCS_PHQ_FINAL) gte 50 and (I_CPCS_LOW_ENRGY + I_CPCS_APPETITE + I_CPCS_SLEEP + I_CPCS_HOPELESS + I_CPCS_SUICIDE + I_CPCS_PLEASURE + I_CPCS_FEEL_BAD +I_CPCS_CONCENTRATION +I_CPCS_SLOW + I_CPCS_PHQ_FINAL) lt 100

OpenClinicaRules:RuleDef.Name: DENTAL
OpenClinicaRules:RuleDef.OpenClinicaRules:Expression: I_CPCS_DENTIST eq 10 or I_CPCS_PAIN_MOUTH eq 10 or I_CPCS_GUM_BLEED eq 10

OpenClinicaRules:RuleDef.Name: BMI_OVERWEIGHT
OpenClinicaRules:RuleDef.Description: Calculates BMI and determines whether the patient is overweight

OpenClinicaRules:RuleDef.Name: AHL
OpenClinicaRules:RuleDef.Description: Literacy test. If answer to first question is A then ok. If not, 4 additional questions asked and correct answers are B, D, A,C. If any wrong then test failed, evaluate to true.
OpenClinicaRules:RuleDef.OpenClinicaRules:Expression: I_CPCS_LIT_BRIEF_1 ne 10 and (I_CPCS_LIT_BRIEF_2 + I_CPCS_LIT_BRIEF_2A + I_CPCS_LIT_BRIEF_3 + I_CPCS_LIT_BRIEF_3A) ne 40

OpenClinicaRules:RuleDef.Name: SD
OpenClinicaRules:RuleDef.OpenClinicaRules:Expression: I_CPCS_LOW_ENRGY + I_CPCS_APPETITE + I_CPCS_SLEEP + I_CPCS_HOPELESS + I_CPCS_SUICIDE + I_CPCS_PLEASURE + I_CPCS_FEEL_BAD +I_CPCS_CONCENTRATION +I_CPCS_SLOW + I_CPCS_PHQ_FINAL gt 200
